name: Bloodstained Puppet (eggshell.d)
description:
Not really a remaster— we are just republishing the game because we decided to come back and finish it :)

Bloodstained Puppet is a game created around a simple idea— failure is progression.

Every door you reach takes you a level forward, and every time you “die” you go back one.

Originally created with my brother over a single weekend at the beginning of March, we decided to go back in and “remaster” it, and more than doubled the content.

I hope you enjoy!

Z to dash

X / space to Jump
